General.Name: Grupo Posadas S.A.B. de C.V
General.Description: Grupo Posadas, S.A.B. de C.V. owns and operates hotels primarily in Mexico. The company operates hotels primarily under the Live Aqua, Grand Fiesta Americana, Curamoria, Fiesta Americana, IOH, The Explorean, Fiesta Inn, One, and Gamma brand names. It also operates Fiesta Americana Vacation Club; Kívac, a point system that offers access to hotels and experiences in Mexico; and Live Aqua Residence Club, a club with a portfolio of residential and hotel vacation properties. Grupo Posadas, S.A.B. de C.V. was incorporated in 1967 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.
General.Address: ProlongaciOn Paseo de la Reforma 1015, Mexico City, DF, Mexico, 01210
